title: Design Pattern-Based Online Course Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A Program for Learners in Managerial/Leadership Roles to Systematically Learn Online Course Design in Elementary Education

learning_goals: Learners can design online course structures using three core design patterns in a VLE environment
Learners can produce weekly learning modules incorporating interactive elements that enhance learner engagement
Learners can achieve over 80% compliance with visual consistency and usability standards when organizing content using the proposed design pattern catalog

resources: Access to VLE (Virtual Learning Environment) Sample Platform

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
